xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp

接口 FsTcpServer

  • 所有超级接口:
    FsTcpEndpoint

    @ThreadSafe
public interface FsTcpServer
extends FsTcpEndpoint
    TCP/IP server interface, server endpoint of FsTcpEndpoint. The implementation should use FsTcpChannel to represents connection between server and remote endpoints. And should support following types of callback handler:
    • one FsTcpServerHandler: to callback for server events;
    • a list of FsTcpClientHandler: to callback for connection events;

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  FsTcpServer.Builder
      Builder for FsTcpServer, based on ServerSocket.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static FsTcpServer.Builder newBuilder()
      Returns new builder of FsTcpServer.
      default void start()
      Starts this server and wait until the server and all connections have been closed.
      void start(boolean block)
      Starts this server.
      FsTcpServer.Builder toBuilder()
      Returns a new builder configured with this server.

      • 从接口继承的方法 xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp.FsTcpEndpoint

        close, close, closeNow, getAddress, getPort, getSocketAddress, getSource, isClosed, isOpened

    • 方法详细资料

      • newBuilder

        static FsTcpServer.Builder newBuilder()
        Returns new builder of FsTcpServer. The returned builder is based on ServerSocket.
        返回:
        new builder

      • start

        default void start()
        Starts this server and wait until the server and all connections have been closed. This method is equivalent to start(boolean): 
             start(true);

      • start

        void start(boolean block)
        Starts this server. If given block is true, this method will block current thread until the server and all connections have been closed.
        参数:
        block - whether block current thread

      • toBuilder

        FsTcpServer.Builder toBuilder()
        Returns a new builder configured with this server.
        返回:
        a new builder configured with this server
